value.title: Create Slope Chart (KPI) using Charticulator and using in Power BI
value.excerpt: This another my investigation on creating a custom visual using Charticulator. I created a Slope Chart that can be used as a KPI visual to measure the trend of a specific group in two different scales. IN this example, I have a simple data set with student Name, their score in 2015 and 2014 and another

value.title: How to build custom visuals without code with Power BI | Community Webinar
value.excerpt: In this webinar, learn how to create custom visuals without writing code using a project that originated from Microsoft's own Charticulator. Go through multiple examples of building custom visuals to understand how this tool can fill specific reporting needs.   Learn more: https://community.powerbi.com

value.title: PowerBI Tips Introducing Custom Visuals Gallery

Gallery (Download Free Visualization Files) http://gallery.powerbi.tips  Charts (Free no code solution to building visualizations) http://charts.powerbi.tips

value.title: PowerBI.tips - PUG - External Tools & Business Ops
value.excerpt: This month Mike and Seth go through the external tools functionality of Power BI desktop.  Additionally, we are introduced to the Amazing Business Ops tool which helps users add External tools into Power BI desktop.   Download Business Ops: https://powerbi.tips/product/business-ops-beta/

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - ALM ToolKit with Christian Wade
value.excerpt: The ALM Toolkit is an excellent tool for aiding users with Tabular Model management.  Christian Wade has been generous enough to provide us with a detailed tutorial on the ALM ToolKit.    ALM Toolkit provides the following features: - Database Compare - Code Merging - Easy Deployments - Source-Control

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Building Custom Visuals - A Basic Bar Chart

To create your own custom visuals visit: http://charts.powerbi.tips   Down community

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - DAX Studio Full Features Review - By Darren Gosbell

In this live webinar Darren will be giving a full overview of all the features of DAX Studio.  - https://daxstudio.org/documentation/features/  Watch the Full Tutorial Series:

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - DAX Studio Query Performance Tuning - By Marco Russo
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Marco Russo contributor to DAX Studio will be giving us a deep dive and demo around using DAX Studio for Query Performance Tuning. value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - DAX Studio Release 2.11.1
value.excerpt: DAX Studio has just released it's latest version 2.11.1.  With this release comes a number of great improvements.  Come listen to the Creator Darren Gosbell review the latest features of DAX Studio.  New features include:  - Query Builder  - Query Benchmark  - More Quick access buttons  - Exporting button

value.title: PowerBI.tips - Tutorial - Monkey Tool Introduction - Part 1

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Stacked Bar Chart with Grand Totals
